[size=20pt][i][b]"This server is Perfect. Fast Levels, Fast money making, Perfect PKing just like 06!"[/b][/i][/size]
[size=15pt]Old School || PKing || Skilling || Great Community || Great Economy || Fast Growing || 24/7 Dedicated || Fun![/size]
[center][size=20pt]• All Weapon Specials 100% • PERFECT Switching • Perfect Combat • Active Pking • Skilling • Daily Updates • Forums with High Scores ( Coming soon ) • Custom Webclient ( Coming soon ) • Only Weapons from 2006 • No Lag • No Bugs, Glitches or Duping • VPS Hosted 24/7 • All Staff including Mods are qualified • Much More! [/size][/center]
